Project Proponent: Corporate Carbon Advisory Pty Ltd; Corporate Carbon Solutions Pty Ltd
Project Name: Biomass Solutions, Waste Diversion through Alternative Waste Management at Coffs Harbour
Method: Carbon Credits (Carbon Farming Initiative - Alternative Waste Treatment) Methodology Determination 2015
Project Description: This project transitioned from a revoked ('CFI') method and continues to divert mixed solid waste from landfills to the waste treatment facility for processing using an enclosed composting technology.
Name of person/s to whom the KACCUs issu: BIOMASS SOLUTIONS (COFFS HARBOUR) PTY LIMITED; Corporate Carbon Advisory Pty Ltd
Notes:
16/03/2015 Variation of project method - from the Carbon Credits (Carbon Farming Initiative) (Enclosed Mechanical Processing and Composting Alternative Waste Treatment) Methodology Determination 2013  to the Carbon Credits (Carbon Farming Initiative - Alternative Waste Treatment) Methodology Determination 2015.

07/04/2015 Variation to participant name - to include Corporate Carbon Solutions Pty Ltd as a joint participant.

16/11/2021 This project was contracted in Apr-15 and CAC565757 has now been completed.

15/05/2023 Variation to participant name - from BIOMASS SOLUTIONS (COFFS HARBOUR) PTY LIMITED and Corporate Carbon Solutions Pty Ltd to Corporate Carbon Advisory Pty Ltd and Corporate Carbon Solutions Pty Ltd.
